医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明 JN.1 变体的传播并非由于增强的免疫逃逸研究发现，与其前身 BA.2.86 相比，SARS-CoV-2 的 JN.1 变种可能没有增强免疫逃逸能力，这表明其快速传播还有其他因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240114/JN1-variants-spread-not-due-to-enhanced-immune-escape-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240114/JN1-variants-spread-not-due-to-enhanced-immune-escape-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14f8ee3f-e628-4676-aff0-5f7c83d7c18f Sun, 14 Jan 2024 19:21:00 -0500 JN.1 variant's spread not due to enhanced immune escape, study suggests
新型血液检测有望高精度检测早期癌症研究人员开发了一种新型的基于血浆蛋白质组的测试，用于早期检测多种癌症，在识别低丰度蛋白质生物标志物方面实现了高精度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240114/Novel-blood-test-shows-promise-in-detecting-early-stage-cancers-with-high-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240114/Novel-blood-test-shows-promise-in-detecting-early-stage-cancers-with-high-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f05a0db-19d7-45b1-8131-96297092b21f Sun, 14 Jan 2024 18:23:00 -0500 Novel blood test shows promise in detecting early-stage cancers with high accuracy
研究探索瘤内微生物群作为癌症研究的新前沿研究人员回顾了肿瘤内微生物群在癌症发展中的作用，表明其在预测和治疗各种癌症方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240114/Study-explores-intratumoral-microbiota-as-a-novel-frontier-in-cancer-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240114/Study-explores-intratumoral-microbiota-as-a-novel-frontier-in-cancer-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=174e1184-5e13-40bd-a34a-3d820ec35cf3 Sun, 14 Jan 2024 18:13:00 -0500 Study explores intratumoral microbiota as a novel frontier in cancer research
新研究发现数百种与乳腺癌风险相关的化学物质研究使用评估遗传毒性和内分泌活性的框架，确定了 921 种可能与乳腺癌风险相关的化学物质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240114/Hundreds-of-chemicals-linked-to-breast-cancer-risk-identified-in-new-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240114/Hundreds-of-chemicals-linked-to-breast-cancer-risk-identified-in-new-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4945a4b8-4b47-40f1-93d1-a12d325eddf0 Sun, 14 Jan 2024 17:53:00 -0500 Hundreds of chemicals linked to breast cancer risk identified in new study
研究发现聊天机器人疗法对耳鸣管理有效研究表明，提供认知行为疗法的聊天机器人可以有效帮助管理耳鸣症状，而远程心理学家的治疗并不能显着改善治疗效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240114/Chatbot-therapy-proves- effective-for-tinnitus-management-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240114/Chatbot-therapy-proves- effective-for-tinnitus-management-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b255bca7-534f-4035-a1ad-8c5d38856b62 Sun, 14 Jan 2024 17:47:00 -0500 Chatbot therapy proves effective for tinnitus management, study finds
古代 DNA 将多发性硬化症的起源追溯到 5000 年前的迁徙研究人员创建了世界上最大的古人类基因库，将基因与多发性硬化症风险联系起来，并将其起源追溯到 5000 年前的迁徙。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Ancient-DNA-traces-multiple-sclerosis-origins-to-5000-year-old-migrations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Ancient-DNA-traces-multiple-sclerosis-origins-to-5000-year-old-migrations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6adab036-cd29-4f0b-b35d-3415fa922f7d Sat, 13 Jan 2024 21:08:00 -0500 Ancient DNA traces multiple sclerosis origins to 5,000-year-old migrations
研究将压力与代谢综合征联系起来，强调炎症的作用新研究通过炎症将压力与代谢综合征联系起来，表明压力管理是改善生物健康结果的潜在策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Study-links-stress-to-metabolic-syndrome-highlights-inflammations-role.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Study-links-stress-to-metabolic-syndrome-highlights-inflammations-role.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b781222-d33e-4f28-93e1-0646d816474a Sat, 13 Jan 2024 20:44:00 -0500 Study links stress to metabolic syndrome, highlights inflammation's role
在混合政治关系中浏览新闻：研究探讨媒体对夫妻的影响政治沟通研究探讨了具有不同政治观点的夫妇如何驾驭媒体消费，揭示了管理新闻曝光和关系动态的挑战和策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Navigating-news-in-mixed-political-relationships-Study-explores-medias-impact-on- Couples.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Navigating-news-in-mixed-political-relationships-Study-explores-medias-impact-on- Couples.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0e3aae1-4685-476b-843c-b864c2b3ef4c Sat, 13 Jan 2024 20:33:00 -0500 Navigating news in mixed-political relationships: Study explores media's impact on couples
NHS 需要将非紧急治疗增加 10%，以解决大流行积压问题《柳叶刀》的分析显示，NHS 每月必须治疗至少 10% 的非紧急病例，以减少大流行引起的积压，截至 2022 年 10 月，有超过 720 万例转诊待处理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/NHS-needs-to-ramp-up-non-emergency-treatments-by-1025-to-tackle-pandemic-backlog.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/NHS-needs-to-ramp-up-non-emergency-treatments-by-1025-to-tackle-pandemic-backlog.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=462ab272-8db4-46bf-ae80-0414f09c4813 Sat, 13 Jan 2024 20:19:00 -0500 NHS needs to ramp up non-emergency treatments by 10% to tackle pandemic backlog
古代DNA揭示了特纳和雅各布氏综合症的第一例史前病例新技术增强染色体分析，古代DNA揭示了首个史前特纳综合症和雅各布氏综合症病例https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Ancient-DNA-reveals-first-prehistoric-cases-of-Turner-and-Jacobs-syndromes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Ancient-DNA-reveals-first-prehistoric-cases-of-Turner-and-Jacobs-syndromes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e28eca57-fe8d-4b49-90f8-dccbd603de12 Sat, 13 Jan 2024 20:08:00 -0500 Ancient DNA reveals first prehistoric cases of Turner and Jacob's syndromes
